item.description:
Want to practice speaking Arabic? Join us every other Wednesday evening, in shah Allah, to meet and converse with fellow Arabic language enthusiasts.

We'll look at a chapter of "Mastering Arabic II" and then have a guided conversation based on the reading, and see where it goes from there.  A bit of conversation, a bit of grammar.......

Feel free to bring your favorite material to share, and let's see what happens!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the front corner on the left as you enter from the street.
item.name: Wednesday Evening Arabic Conversation (and maybe a tiny bit of grammar)
